comments.body:
`browserAction.ColorArray` itself seems to be standardized as a part of WebExtension API.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions/API/browserAction/ColorArray
It might be nice to capture this distinction in a test.

The suggested change results in syntax error. This is not an interface. A variable with this new type has to be a `string`, not an `object`.

Also, there are 4 more instances of `type` in this file.
Makes sense. Thanks for the clarification.
